message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity, but I believe $10000 would be a fair price for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand you think $10000 is a fair price, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $16000, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and while I appreciate the compromise, I still believe the product is worth less than $16000 to me. I would like to counteroffer at $14000.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the price lower, but I'm still not willing to go below $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14500, but I think that's as low as I can go.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $13500.
